basics.name: Fraser Burns
basics.label: Quality Control Inspector
basics.summary: A passionate seasoned professional with 13 years of Quality Control Inspection experience in the Oil & Gas industry, also worked for 18 months as a Lab Engineer in Additive Manufacturing, increasing productivity to 90%. He is dedicated to continious improvement and actively supports HSE initiatives as a safety committee member and mentor.

projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
